alert.note: Alert for South Laramie Range (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued January 15 at 3:04PM MST until January 17 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM THIS EVENING TO 5 AM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...West winds 35 to 45 mph with gusts up to 65 mph expected. Areas of blowing and drifting snow with near- blizzard conditions possible at times. * WHERE...South Laramie Range including Interstate 80 between Laramie and Cheyenne. * WHEN...11 PM MST this evening until 5 AM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Mainly to transportation. Strong cross winds will be hazardous to light weight or high profile vehicles, including campers and tractor trailers. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Expect areas of significant blowing and drifting snow. Visibilities may be reduced to one quarter of a mile at times.
info.instruction: A High Wind Warning means a hazardous high wind event is expected or occurring. Sustained wind speeds of at least 40 mph or gusts of 58 mph or more can lead to property damage.
